response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I propose to sell this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure that such a valuable asset finds its way into the hands of someone who appreciates it as much as I do. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can arrange the details accordingly.", "product_price": 750000}
